About

Front End Findings

I'm a front end developer.

I'm always stumbling across weird quirks in the myriad of browsers we have to support these days.

It used to be Internet Explorer, now it is Android.

This blog is my little place to record all of these oddities so that next time I encounter one I know what to do.

  • 06 Feb 2014 » iOS - video volume with JavaScript
  • 06 Feb 2014 » iOS - cannot autoplay video
  • 06 Feb 2014 » Galaxy S4 border-radius
  • 06 Feb 2014 » Android @font-face bug
